quote: If a man has sex with a man
as one does with a woman,
They are to be put to death;
their blood will be on their own heads.
If a man has sexual relations
with a man as one does with a woman,
both of them have done what is detestable.
They are to be put to death;
their blood will be on their own heads.
comment: Not that there aren't any homophobic metal bands, but the Bible said it first.
